channel.title: Addicting Android games?
channel.description:
Looking for more addicting games like this one. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.PIG.CSSlite
Just little quick games nothing serious. Anything helps.

item.title: Addicting Android games?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Aleka, post:6, topic:547634”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=666540.msg4456474#msg4456474 date=1415205232]
http://phandroid.com/2014/05/15/best-android-games-killing-time/

Have you ever heard of google?

Here are more falling games, since that’s what the one you linked is
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dedalord.fallingfred&hl=en
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dedalord.superfallingfred&hl=en
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.noodlecake.happyfall&hl=en
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.reverie.game.fallingball&hl=en
[/quote]

I have to ask have you always been such a dick? I want to hear what other players suggest. Thanks for the comment though.[/quote]

It’s because text has no voice to it so it all comes out dry. But you were asking for "games like ", that’s something very easy to google search…

Read full topic

item.title: Addicting Android games?
item.dc:creator: @Mod-Vlad Mod-Vlad-
item.description:
@Mod-Vlad wrote:

I play Brave Trials for about a month or two already. It’s an MMO and honestly feels like the best one out there on Play Market.
